text:
@realDonaldTrump Is this you’re way of letting us know you’re finally leaving the Oval Office??

Over 105k dead from COVID-19

Economy in recession

Mass unrest as people protesting police brutality are being further brutalized by police 

Scandal after scandal

You think you’ve MAGAed?
